name: Too Fresh, Too Alive
description:
The starts with a Witch giving life to a Sushi. Sushi who came to life trying its best to avoid being eaten.

Finish levels by collecting XP Orbs by avoiding being eaten.

Controls
  • A/D - Left/Right
  • Space - Jump (Unlockable)
  • Shift - Dash (Unlockable)
Spoiler

Each time you die and collect enough XP orbs you will get a skill point which you can use to unlock skills (Jump and Dash).

(Music & sound effects from https://pixabay.com/)
